remarks: Re-index a finite sum using a bijection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumf1o.1 $e |- ( k = G -> B = D ) $.
fsumf1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. Fin ) $.
fsumf1o.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : C -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
fsumf1o.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. C ) -> ( F ` n ) = G ) $.
fsumf1o.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumf1o $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B = sum_ n e. C D ) $.
$d A k n $.
$d B n $.
$d C n $.
$d D k $.
